RNOUGHT: On average, over the past 7 days, Covid-19's basic reproduction number in {country} has been approximately:
RNOUGHTEXPL: A basic reproduction number greater than 1 means the number of cases is growing exponentially, while a number below 1 means the number of cases is declining.
DEATHPROJECTION: Over the past 30 days, {recentDeaths} people in {country} died of Covid-19. If {country} remains on its current trajectory, expect to see {projectionPhrase} number of Covid-19 related deaths over the next 30 days.
